verses.verse: I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> again, and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and behold a <S%H376>man<s%> with a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H2256>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, Whither <S%H1980>goest<s%> thou? And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, To <S%H4058>measure<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, and what is the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof.
And, behold, the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4397>angel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H7323>Run<s%>, <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H1975>this<s%> young <S%H5288>man<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> as towns without <S%H6519>walls<s%> for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H8432>therein<s%>:

For I, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, will be unto her a <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and will be the <S%H3519>glory<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her.

<S%H1945>Ho<s%>, <S%H1945>ho<s%>, come forth, and <S%H5127>flee<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for I have spread you <S%H6566>abroad<s%> as the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H310>After<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> hath he <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H7997>spoiled<s%> you: for he that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> you <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H892>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye<s%>.

For, behold, I will <S%H5130>shake<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon them, and they shall be a <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to their <S%H5647>servants<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

<S%H7442>Sing<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: for, lo, I <S%H935>come<s%>, and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>: and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee, and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto thee.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> his <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>land<s%>, and shall <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> again.

Be <S%H2013>silent<s%>, O all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for he is raised <S%H5782>up<s%> out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation<s%>. his: Heb. the habitation of his holiness
